entities.description: An alternative version of the K6 total score in the past year with values ranging from 0 to 1.
A score variable related to the level of impairment for respondents' daily activities due to emotional, mental, or other difficulties.
An alternative version of the total WHODASTOTSC score.
Predicted probability that a respondent has a Serious Mental Illness (SMI) based on the 2012 mental illness prediction model.

relationships.description: Indicates that KSSL6RMAX represents the maximum value of AKSSL6RWST.
Relates an individual's difficulty in performing daily activities to the WHODASTOTSC score.
Defines the alternative version of the WHODASTOTSC score.
Indicates that SMIPPY predicts the likelihood of Serious Mental Illness (SMI).
